workWithUs.howWeWorkDescription: A personalized approach and precision — from the first measurement to the last screw.
workWithUs.step1Description: A specialist takes all measurements, considering niches, pipes, outlets, projections — so nothing interferes with the future kitchen. This is free of charge.
workWithUs.step2Description: We create a kitchen layout in the official program from the furniture manufacturer. The program considers everything: room dimensions, niches, layout features, and most importantly — the dimensions of household appliances from the built-in database. This eliminates errors and guarantees everything will fit perfectly.
workWithUs.step3Description: You receive a realistic project and the final estimate. No hidden additional charges — everything is transparent.
workWithUs.step4Description: After approval, the order goes into production. Installation is carried out by certified installers — clean, neat, and according to standards.
